question_id: Resep apa saja yang memakai bahan daun? Cantumkan judul resep dan nama bahannya.
sql_query:
SELECT
  m.nama_masakan AS judul_resep,
  b.nama_bahan AS nama_bahan
FROM masakan AS m
JOIN resep_bahan AS rb
  ON m.kode_masakan = rb.id_resep
JOIN bahan AS b
  ON rb.id_bahan = b.id_bahan
WHERE
  b.kategori_bahan = 'Sayuran'
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  m.nama_masakan AS judul_resep,
  b.nama_bahan AS nama_bahan
FROM masakan AS m
JOIN resep_bahan AS rb
  ON m.kode_masakan = rb.id_resep
JOIN bahan AS b
  ON rb.id_bahan = b.id_bahan
WHERE
  b.kategori_bahan = 'Sayuran';
```
